judicialResults.label: Community order varied
judicialResults.resultText:
COV - Community order varied
Order made on 12/12/2024 by Aberdeen JP Court varied. The end date of the order has been changed and the requirements must be complied with by 12/12/2024. The new and amended requirements are shown below. The responsible officer nominated is a member of the youth offending team. The supervising court is Aberdeen JP Court.

judicialResults.label: Attendance centre
judicialResults.resultText:
ACR - Attendance centre
Attendance Centre Requirement: Attend for 200 Hours.

judicialResults.resultText: The new and amended requirements are shown below.

judicialResults.label: Imprisonment
judicialResults.resultText:
IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 1 Years. Reason: failure to comply with a pre-sentence drug testing order because of an unprovoked attack of a serious nature. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 1. Total custodial period: 1 Years.
